name: PING 99
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 49

PING 99

PING 99 is a game where you have to get as many scores as possible by playing 3 games, sounds fun doesn't it? but is it fun if your internet is unstable?

Tips

if the game becomes slow and loses internet connection you can click the [esc] button to exit the game and then go around looking for a place to get an internet connection again.

Controls

- move [arrow]

- in games [Z, X]

- return to menu [space]

- change view [esc]

Credits

MFauzan - programming & art

David Bock - music & sfx
